summary: My attempt at recreating Ep10 and Ep9 Mix set
descriptionHtml:
I was inspired by these screenshots [url=http://i.imgur.com/QYL40.jpg]here[/url] and [url=http://i.imgur.com/DkTHT.jpg]here[/url].
So I decided to have a go at getting as close to them as possible.
Mesh belongs to some Chinese modder, I redid the textures (they were UGLY before) and the nifs.
The armor can be crafted and upgraded in game with just leather strips.
If you don\'t want to craft it, type \"help legendary\" into the console and then add the items to your inventory.

If you have the time, please provide screenshots here, because my machine can\'t deal with high settings, so my screenshots look like ass.

Hf!
author: wvh
